Guides Language Reference Package Index

Package

allegro

Initializers

🆕

Methods

🏷

Class 📺

📺 represents a display.

All drawing operations end up being visible on a display which is the same as a window in windowed environments. Thus, before anything is displayed, a display needs to be created.

Initializers

🆕

🔓 🐈 🆕 width 🚂 height 🚂

Creates a display with the given width and height.

Methods

🏷

🔓 🐖 🏷 title 🔡 ➡️ ✨

Sets the the title of the window.
